body_html:
Thanks, the set_shape works well here.

But one thing I'm curious about is that, if I split the graph, (add a sess.run, and get the result of image array, then construct tensor, send it to rest of the graph), does this increase overhead?
While actually when running it, it seems that the "set_shape" method will take more time to run than 'split graph" method...
I'm not clear how much overhead does it take if I split the graph and run session.

body:
Thanks, the set_shape works well here.

But one thing I'm curious about is that, if I split the graph, (add a sess.run, and get the result of image array, then construct tensor, send it to rest of the graph), does this increase overhead? 
While actually when running it, it seems that the "set_shape" method will take more time to run than 'split graph" method...
I'm not clear how much overhead does it take if I split the graph and run session.
